int factorial(int n)
{
    if(n < 1)
        return 1;
    else
        return (n * factorial(n - 1));
}   
   
    
   main:
		lw $3, 0($0) 
		add $7, $29, $0
    		jal factorial
		j Exit
    
   factorial:   addi $7, $7, -8
                sw $31, 4($7)
                sw $3, 0($7)

                slti $8, $3, 1
                beq $8, $0, L1
                addi $1, $0, 1
                addi $7, $7, 8
                jr $31

                L1: addi $3, $3, -1
                    jal factorial
                    
                lw $3, 0($7)
                lw $31, 4($7)
                addi $7, $7, 8

                mul $1, $3, $1

                jr $31

Exit:
